issue.title: [C++][Compute] Add utf8_format kernel
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-12990](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-12990). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
This should be an inverse operation of the split kernels and `extract_regex` taking a list/struct-of-strings argument and combining it into a single string output with a format string (provided through a FunctionOptions subclass).

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-12990?focusedCommentId=17365098) by Joris Van den Bossche (jorisvandenbossche):*
The inverse of the split kernel is "binary_join" which is already implemented?

***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-12990?focusedCommentId=17365113) by Ian Cook (icook):*
